title: White asparagus and smoked salmon starter
ingredients: ['300g white asparagus', 'salt to taste', '1 pinch caster sugar', '1 knob butter', '100g smoked salmon', '3 tablespoons corn oil (or sunflower or rapeseed oil)', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh herbs, such as parsley or wild garlic', '30g Parmesan cheese', 'coarsely ground pepper to taste']
